seo.title: Coaching services
seo.description: Explore SustainSage coaching pathways designed for relocation, return-to-work clarity, and UK workplace confidence.

hero.title: Coaching pathways shaped with you
hero.subtitle: Each pathway is a starting point. We adapt pace, language, and focus once we understand your reality.

pathways.title: Choose a pathway
pathways.description: Three routes we are often asked to support. They stay flexible and client-led.

cards.title: Transition & relocation
cards.target: For people relocating or living between cultures.
cards.scenario: You want steadiness while settling in the UK and holding responsibilities elsewhere.
topics: Map support systems and agreements that travel with you.
Name grief, belonging, and agency without rushing to fix.
Design experiments to root in new communities at your pace.

cards.title: Return-to-work & clarity
cards.target: For carers, parents, and professionals re-entering paid work.
cards.scenario: You are rebuilding confidence and rhythms after a pause or role shift.
topics: Clarify priorities and capacities across care, career, and community.
Reframe stories about worthiness, readiness, and productivity.
Create consent-based routines and support check-ins with people who matter.

cards.title: UK workplace confidence
cards.target: For leaders navigating UK communication cultures.
cards.scenario: You are translating ideas across accents, expectations, and unwritten rules.
topics: Practise language for asking, declining, and setting boundaries.
Explore feedback dynamics and advocacy strategies that suit you.
Identify allies and rituals that help you stay resourced.

cta.title: Not sure where to start?
cta.body: A 20-minute intro chat lets us hear your context and shape the right mix together.
